import React from 'react'; import {Button} from './Button'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import './Bio.css'; function Bio({ img, alt, imgStart }) { return ( <>

Hi, I\'m Javier Cardenas, a UI/UX Designer and Front-End Developer based in Salinas, CA.

I'm currently unemployed and very poor so would love the opportunity to make money through this shit. I have been dedicating time to learning design and front end development on my own.

I graduated with a Data Science degree from UC Berkeley; however, I do not like data science so I shifted my focus to this bullshit now. Jk not bullshit this is actually what I'm passionate about I love creating and art and people jk I dont really like people smu

) } export default Bio;
